item.title: Project Lifecycle
item.description: Lifecycle of a Software Project # Each section below describes one phase of a software project. Requirements Gathering # Decide what problem we’re going to solve, and what “solved” means. Identify who the customers are Understand what they do, and what they need Understand how they will use the system and what they expect Identify a list of “key approvers” (individual humans, not teams) Propose and get approval on: A summary of the problem the project will solve A list of concrete, measurable goals for the project to achieve A list of things the project will NOT achieve (“out of scope”) Technical Design # Decide how we will meet all of the requirements.
